price: [En el Paraíso] estarán reclinados sobre sofás, a salvo del calor ardiente del Sol y la severidad del frío.
arabic: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِۖ لَا يَرَوۡنَ فِيهَا شَمۡسٗا وَلَا زَمۡهَرِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna fīhā ʿalā al-arāiki lā yarawna fīhā shamsan walā zamharīran
